features.title: Database Migrations

features.title: Background Tasks
features.description: Async task queue for long-running operations.

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Implement secure user authentication with login, logout, and session management.
features.justification: Essential for user management and security.

features.title: Error Handling & Logging
features.description: Comprehensive error handling with structured logging for debugging and monitoring.
features.justification: Critical for maintaining production stability and debugging issues.

features.title: API Documentation
features.description: Auto-generated API documentation with interactive examples.

features.title: Performance Optimization
features.description: Implement caching, lazy loading, and query optimization.
features.justification: Improves user experience and reduces server costs.

features.title: Automated Testing
features.description: Unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end testing setup.
features.justification: Ensures code quality and prevents regressions.

features.title: CI/CD Pipeline
features.description: Automated build, test, and deployment workflow.
features.justification: Speeds up development and ensures consistent deployments.

features.title: User Dashboard
features.description: Central dashboard for users to view and manage their data.
features.justification: Core user interface for the application.
